headline: Rudy Giuliani’s Reveal On ‘The Masked Singer’ Triggers Celebrity Judges Robin Thicke, Ken Jeong
author: Kellen McGovern Jones
sentences: Rudy Giuliani was reportedly revealed to be a contestant on “The Masked Singer” and prompted two show celebrity judges to walk out in protest during the taping of the seventh season premiere.
The former mayor of New York City and head of former President Donald Trump’s election legal team was unmasked as an exiting contestant from Fox’s game show, Deadline reported Wednesday.
Two of the show’s judges, Robin Thicke and Ken Jeong, left the stage in protest when they learned the contestant was Giuliani, according to the report.

Comments:
I didn't even know this show was on the air, and I probably wouldn't have watched it even if I did.
